overview: Andrew Graf is responsible for governing Datran Media’s corporate finance and investment functions, including its active M&A program. Mr. Graf brings nearly two decades of legal and financial expertise to the company. In his most recent role as executive vice president of corporate development and secretary and general counsel for Enliven Marketing Technologies, Mr. Graf helped the publicly-traded company raise over $20 million in capital, acquire two companies and merge with a larger public entity for several times its revenue multiple. Prior to his role at Enliven, Mr. Graf represented public and private companies in mergers and acquisitions, IPOs, private placements and corporate and security law matters as a global corporate and M&A associate for Milbank, Tweed, Hadley & McCloy in New York. Earlier in his career, he held finance and accounting positions at HarperCollins and Arthur Andersen. Mr. Graf is a graduate of New York University’s Stern School of Business and holds Juris Doctorate from the Cardozo School of Law.
